sentences.english: May be locked lonely heart of the spring, or is nostalgia.
sentences.chinese: 或许是寂寞锁住了春心，又或者是留恋。

sentences.english: Over painted garden walls, some low, some high, springtime longings swirl and fly.
sentences.chinese: 少什么低就高来粉画垣，原来春心无处不飞悬。

sentences.english: Deep palace adytum, do not block girl desire for love to stir.
sentences.chinese: 深宫内院，挡不住少女春心萌动。

sentences.english: She desires his young, strong body.
sentences.chinese: 他年轻强壮的身体使她春心荡漾。

sentences.english: Three point Qiu-xiang truth in love, hug into the bridal chamber.
sentences.chinese: 三点秋香真情在，春心拥抱入洞房。

sentences.english: Spring flowers residual cardiac deficiencies go, how autumn over vagrant hearts?
sentences.chinese: 春心未尽花残去，秋风怎过荡子心？

definition: same as 懷春|怀春[huai2 chun1]
the affection, or heart, of a young woman
reluctance to leave this world/heart set on the mundane
scenes of springtime/the radiance of spring/(fig.) a sight of sth sexy or erotic/an indication of a love affair
autumn ripples/(fig.) luminous eyes of a woman/amorous glance
(lit.) love aperture/(fig.) interest in love matters
